headline: Michael Bowes Appointed Executive Vice President, Chief People Officer, The Estée Lauder Companies
summary: The Estée Lauder Companies Inc. today announced that Michael Bowes has been appointed Executive Vice President, Chief People Officer, effective April 1, 2025, reporting directly to President and...

headline: Michael O'Hare, Executive Vice President, Chief Human Resources Officer, to Retire from The Estee Lauder Companies
summary: The Estee Lauder Companies Inc. today announced that Michael O'Hare, Executive Vice President, Chief Human Resources Officer, plans to retire and will step down from his role effective April 1, 2025....
